data.text: @Kalpana43574207 @AUThackeray @mybmc @mybmcedu Please sir do listen to our request.....ur decision is showing ignorance towards us and our kids.. pls carry on with hybrid classes, parents willing to send their kids to school are already dng it, thn why to stop online classes too. Please understand two sides of the same coin.

@AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide How just how everyone is like we want hybrid then ur dusty musty azz be like yes i think people want offline compulsory litreally you guys think from ur butt

@KaaijSanne @RukhsanaVanjara @AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide As a student i can safely say i dont want to goto offline school especially at the end of the term with exams on the way

@AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide Its a kind request please don't make it https://t.co/iUF08RKa43 can small children wear masks for 8 hrs nonstop?also no canteen facilities yet in our school.let schools be fully prepared before reopening. Less than 10days left of this academic session.whats the hurry to open now
@PreetSharma25 @AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide What was wrong with the hybrid system 1st place
@AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide WTF i litreally have no time to complete anything in my books

@AUThackeray @mybmcedu @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide Opening schools tto hust take exams. Post this declaration, one day before the exams - the exams went offline. Why couldn't this be considered? Are you even thinking about the students ! Imagine the pain and trauma

@Anshubatra17 @Supriya14765249 @AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide Looks like you have issues for everything in your life..pay attention to your family and kid .leave the other parents and kids alone..And stop bullying other people .

@Anshubatra17 @Supriya14765249 @AUThackeray @mybmc @mayor_mumbai @KishoriPednekar @IqbalSinghChah2 @AshwiniBhide .And again who are you to make any decisions for other kids .And I am done with you..Ur free to send your child..Damn stop bullying other parents..Again let other parents decide..And now go take a chill pill..and stop messaging..
